reviews.title: Flexable
reviews.text: It is flexable and can work without micromanagement. I enjoy being able to work alone and do a good job without any supervision.I am satisfied with the job.

reviews.title: 2 stars
reviews.text:
What is the best part of working at the company?
They are an international company that require a consistent, high-
 quality standards from their photographer.

What is the most stressful part about working at the company?
No support from Airbnb and their photography department.  There is no contact at Airbnb for questions and support from anyone at the photography department.  It takes 5 days for them to return an email. They seem to make a point of distancing themselves from both the photographer and host.

What is the work environment and culture like at the company?
Hard to tell.  To have a culture there has to be interaction, and the Photography Department seems to make it an operating rule to not interact with its photographers.

What is a typical day like for you at the company?
Drive at least an hour to a property and make beautiful pictures for an hour and half.

reviews.title: Let's me be independent
reviews.text: Like that I can it doesn't take up my whole day. I dread when there's big parties but for the most part it's ok. The laundry can be time consuming. The owner of the house was very specific about where everything was placed⁶t

reviews.title: 5 stars
reviews.text:
What is the best part of working at the company?
Extra income and meeting people from different states.  During the  Covid first onset I had one guest from New Zealand who got stuck in the states and ending up staying at my place for a couple of months.  

What is the most stressful part about working at the company?
Guest who are disrespectful and do not follow the house rules.

reviews.title: Fun and exciting that's all in the details
reviews.text: I love exploring all the details in a luxury property, seeing the uniqueness and offering my insights to make a property perfect for guests. Having the ability to contact someone for clarification or problems is a huge benefit.

reviews.title: It’s diverse
reviews.text: It’s a place to meet new people from different cultures and to make new friends, the office is fun to be as you will not be bored because you will meet or know someone.
reviews.cons: Busy depending on the account you work for

reviews.title: Airbnb is a platform that you can use to create your listing your space and rent it to guests
reviews.text: Excellent platform to listing your space, apartment or house to rent. I received guests for different part of the world and got to know their culture and their cuisine.

reviews.title: Nice way to make extra income
reviews.text: Its nice making your own schedule, sometimes guest will break things or take the keys and the dispute process to get reimbursed can take a little time to complete.

reviews.title: Travail Agréable
reviews.text: Travail et endroit agréable pour y travailler. Très bon culture.

reviews.title: Es una empresa que ofrece hospedaje atraves de una plataforma digital.
reviews.text:
Trabajar en Airbnb es muy bonito porque conoces familias, personas de varias ciudades y nacionalidades.

Administrar una casa para Airbnb te pide mucha responsabilidad, puntualidad, ser una persona ordenada y tener un ambiente laborar placentero, muy limpio y lleno de armonía.

Airbnb te evalúa en cuanto a tu desempeño, trato para con los huespedes desde la manera como los recibes y estas al pendiente de que en su estancia en la casa tengan todo lo que necesitan y estén comos y felices 

Airbnb te evalúa y eso hace que tu desempeño sea de lo mejor que puedas dar.

reviews.title: Fun, positive energy
reviews.text: I love my job and my schedule is flexible and the management is available always if I have questions I love working here I need to relocate and my job tasks are minimum and my commute workers are amazing people
reviews.cons: People won’t leave expected to do a sink full of someone else’s dishes

reviews.title: Fulfilling, turning passions and lifestyles into a lucrative investment. I love the amazing support and inclusive company of like minds!
reviews.text: Airbnb is a heaven sent company with a personal sense of community and commitment to excellence! I take pride in communicating with amazing and friendly guests, hosts and staff at my convenience 24 hours a day. Most people are friendly, informative and usually very grateful. It has allowed me to share in the exciting opportunities in travel and sharing the dream of our Mountain Cabin, as well as being a guest in other unique spaces. The hardest part of the job is the upkeep of the property, yet, Airbnb has made it fulfilling and more of a privilege than a chore. It has allowed me to maintain my Independence, which is most valuable to me! The most enjoyable thing is making friends and hosting our guests, and sharing the dream with special people!

reviews.title: Pas mal
reviews.text: Formateur cette expérience vous permet d acquérir des soft skills

reviews.title: Its fun and i am around family
reviews.text: Its an easy job and teaches me to be clean in my own home. It can be either really long or fairly quick depending on the type of person staying there.

reviews.title: Awesome company
reviews.text:
Very nice company to work with and have nice work life balance
You can actually enjoy working here 
And work life balance is awesome and fun loving and worth having

reviews.title: Good Sideline
reviews.text: As an Airbnb host, I have never experienced bad customer service whenever there's an issue with guests. They are really prompt with the requests and will make a sound judgment for both tenant and host.

reviews.title: Constant change
reviews.text: Great opportunities to learn as the company is always changing and evolving - on the downside, this can be unsettling and chaotic at times. Need to be able to work with ambiguity

reviews.title: Fun and inviting
reviews.text: In my short time with Airbnb, you can feel that hospitality isn’t just given to paying customers, it’s extended to the employees that come in. With many ways to connect with different employees from different departments while working remotely, it allows the fostering of life long relationships.

reviews.title: Easy and fun workplace
reviews.text: The easiest work I've ever done. Very engaging and interesting each day. Learned new things each work day. Very relaxed work and not too much stress.

reviews.title: I loved working there. They maintain a high standard of professionalism and work ethic.
reviews.text: I recommend anyone who takes pride in there work to apply with airbnb. Tge experience waas great and I would definetly work there again. I loved my job there.
reviews.cons: My job was on call, even in the mifdle of the night.
